creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text: If the live sitetree is checked out, it becomes impossible to check it back in. The only way to do so is edit content/live/sitetree.xml.rcml and restart the application. With using quotas, this happens too frequently to be practical and an in site method is needed.
Added admin option that shows up when the live sitetree is checked out in r634844. This allows admins to force a check in of the live sitetree.
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
